data.message:
A game 

In the game of life I wanna hide, I'd be positive if so many didn't die because HIV negatively putting you on a down hill slide ... Religion, science stand far apart when they should be side by side, in my eyes I see hives of lives falling to karma's knife or worse the cells started to divide...  Still I see everyone's beauty shine, love arrives to only find a way to fly higher than you can reach, down goes your pride. In all this negativity we find productivity that confines, confused and deprived ... Maybe he forgot this on day five , I don't know why ? I ask only to be surprised and see the crime rate dive along with those who lost there lives... I've spent a long time wondering how can the lowest of the low survive ... Forgotten bombed and blind..
The rich dine with gold forks and knives while the poor lady covers miles just make her baby smile ... The gap between the living and already died was along time ago, so I .. Wanna say goodbye... So many left hidden in the pain they hide , too many to cry and pray just to make it right ... Living is a privilege but beaten down is the worlds pride. 
Sit back just to watch the political monopoly wave ride, monopolised wavelengths that find loopholes to hide... A game worth playing for a a game saying ... That our love was God and money turned even that into Satan .
